plugins.name: Amplemarket Testimonial Generator
plugins.description: This plugin allows the Amplemarket team to create testimonial cards for sharing on social media. Using a template from Amplemarket's Brand System, users can select an avatar image, name, role, company, and the actual testimonial shared with the team. They can also choose between light and dark modes, and decide whether to blur the person's details.
plugins.tagline: A plugin that generates testimonial cards to help automate the Amplemarket team's workflow.

136259.name: Amplemarket Testimonial Generator
136259.description: This plugin allows the Amplemarket team to create testimonial cards for sharing on social media. Using a template from Amplemarket's Brand System, users can select an avatar image, name, role, company, and the actual testimonial shared with the team. They can also choose between light and dark modes, and decide whether to blur the person's details.
136259.release_notes: Fixing light blurred card content height
136259.tagline: A plugin that generates testimonial cards to help automate the Amplemarket team's workflow.

plugins.name: FigJam Stickies Export
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for exporting FigJam data, and it has the following capabilities:

  1. It supports exporting FigJam stickies as CSV or Excel files.
  2. It supports categorizing data according to Sections.
  3. Currently, it does not support Section nesting.
  4. It supports exporting the entire file or the selection.

Come and try using this plugin! If there is anything that could be improved, you are welcome to provide your feedback!
plugins.tagline: A plugin for exporting FigJam data group by Section

123786.name: FigJam Stickies Export
123786.description:
This is a plugin for exporting FigJam data, and it has the following capabilities:

  1. It supports exporting FigJam stickies as CSV or Excel files.
  2. It supports categorizing data according to Sections.
  3. Currently, it does not support Section nesting.
  4. It supports exporting the entire file or the selection.

Come and try using this plugin! If there is anything that could be improved, you are welcome to provide your feedback!
123786.tagline: A plugin for exporting FigJam data group by Section

plugins.name: Text to Sequence
plugins.description:
Text to Sequence automatically converts selected text layers to sequential numbers in a Z-pattern flow. Perfect for document page numbers. Simply select text layers and choose your preferred numbering style: standard numbers, padded numbers (01, 02...), or letters (a,b,c... / A,B,C...). You can also set a custom starting number.


選択したテキストレイヤーをZの字順に連続した番号に変換します。資料のページ番号を振る際に活躍します。テキストレイヤーを選択し、お好みの連番スタイルを選択してください。
plugins.tagline: Quick Z-pattern numbering for your text layers.

130144.name: Text to Sequence
130144.description:
Text to Sequence automatically converts selected text layers to sequential numbers in a Z-pattern flow. Perfect for document page numbers. Simply select text layers and choose your preferred numbering style: standard numbers, padded numbers (01, 02...), or letters (a,b,c... / A,B,C...). You can also set a custom starting number.


選択したテキストレイヤーをZの字順に連続した番号に変換します。資料のページ番号を振る際に活躍します。テキストレイヤーを選択し、お好みの連番スタイルを選択してください。
130144.tagline: Quick Z-pattern numbering for your text layers.

plugins.name: Select Every 2nd Item
plugins.description:
Designed for scenarios involving data tables with numerous rows, this plugin enables you to assign a distinct background color to every second item, creating a zebra striping effect for improved table scanning.


However, the plugin can be used for other use cases as well.


Upon executing the plugin, you have the choice to begin with either the first or second item in the group or frame.
plugins.tagline: Perfect for applying zebra striping to data tables rows

84319.name: Select Every 2nd Item
84319.description:
Designed for scenarios involving data tables with numerous rows, this plugin enables you to assign a distinct background color to every second item, creating a zebra striping effect for improved table scanning.


However, the plugin can be used for other use cases as well.


Upon executing the plugin, you have the choice to begin with either the first or second item in the group or frame.
84319.tagline: Perfect for applying zebra striping to data tables rows

plugins.name: Copy-writer agent
plugins.description:
Content Writer Agent: Your Content AI Text Assistant in Figma


Tired of manually tweaking text, fixing typos, translating snippets, or shortening

content within your Figma designs? Content Writer Agent brings the power of

advanced AI directly into your workflow, saving you time and boosting your creativity!

Select any text layers, give a simple instruction (like "Make this more formal",

"Translate to German", "Fix grammar", or "Summarize"), and let the AI handle the

heavy lifting. See the changes side-by-side, compare with the original, and replace

text with a single click.


Key Features:

  1. AI-Powered Editing: Use prompts to rewrite, translate, fix grammar,
  2. shorten, or modify selected text layers.
  3. Side-by-Side Diff: Clearly see the original text and the AI-generated
  4. suggestion, with deletions highlighted.
  5. One-Click Replace: Update single or multiple text layers in your Figma file
  6. instantly.
  7. One-Step Undo: Easily revert any replacement back to the previous text.
  8. Flexible LLM Support: Choose between Google's Gemini (requires API
  9. key) or a self-hosted Ollama instance with your favorite local models. (OpenAI
  10. coming soon!)
  11. Easy Configuration: Simple settings panel to manage your LLM provider
  12. and credentials.
  13. Light & Dark Mode: Adapts automatically or lets you choose via settings.
  14. Free Tier: Get started with 10 free AI generations per day!


Who is it for?

  1. UI/UX Designers: Quickly iterate on microcopy, button labels, and placeholder
  2. Copywriters & Marketers: Draft, refine, and translate marketing copy directly
  3. within design mockups.
  4. Content Creators: Ensure consistency and clarity in text across designs.
  5. Anyone who works with text in Figma!


Getting Started & Configuration Guide

  1. Install: Install the "Content Writer Agent" plugin from the Figma Community.
  2. Run: Right-click on the Figma canvas -> Plugins -> Content Writer Agent.
  3. Basic Use:
  4. Select one or more text layers in your Figma file. The plugin UI will update automatically.
  5. Enter a prompt in the input field (e.g., "Make this punchier").
  6. Click "Generate".
  7. Review the original and generated text in the cards.
  8. Click "Replace" on a card to update that specific text layer in Figma, or
  9. "Replace All Valid" to update all cards with valid generated text.
  10. If you replaced text, an "Undo" button appears allowing you to revert that specific change.
  11. Configure Your AI Provider (Settings):
  12. Click the Settings icon ( ) in the plugin header or the clickable provider tag next to it.
  13. Choose Provider: Select "Gemini", "Ollama", "OpenAI", or "Custom Model..." from the "LLM Provider" dropdown.

a) Gemini Setup:

  1. Select "Gemini" in the dropdown.
  2. You need a Google AI API Key. You can get one for free from Google
  3. AI Studio.
  4. Click the "Get your Gemini API Key" link or visit https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey.
  5. Copy your generated API key.
  6. Paste the key into the "Gemini API Key" input field in the plugin settings.
  7. Click "Apply Settings".

b) Ollama Setup:

  1. Select "Ollama" in the dropdown.
  2. Ensure Ollama is Installed & Running: You need Ollama running on
  3. your local machine or a reachable server. If you haven't installed it, visit ollama.com.
  4. Enter Server URL: Input the URL where your Ollama server is running (default is http://localhost:11434 ).
  5. Fetch & Select Model: Click the "Refresh" button ( ) next to the URL field. The plugin will attempt to connect and fetch the list of models available on your Ollama server. Select the desired model (e.g., llama3:latest , mistral:latest ) from the "Model Name" dropdown.
  6. (IMPORTANT) CORS Configuration: If fetching models fails (especially with Failed to fetch errors), your Ollama server likely needs CORS configuration to allow requests from Figma. See the detailed instructions within the settings panel error message for help.
  7. Click "Apply Settings".


Need Help or a Custom Model?

If you encounter issues, need support for a different model/provider, or have

feedback, please reach out!

Request Custom Model/Provider: Select "Custom Model..." from the LLM

Provider dropdown in Settings and use the contact link.

General Support/Feedback: Email ahmmigo0@gmail.com

Stop wasting time on repetitive text edits. Install Content Writer Agent and let AI

accelerate your design workflow!
plugins.tagline: Your Content AI Text Assistant in Figma (Choose your prefered LLM model)

plugins.name: A Color Palette
plugins.description:
A powerful color adjustment tool that allows you to:

• Adjust colors in specific ranges (Red, Yellow, Green, Cyan, Blue, Purple)

• Fine-tune HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness) values with precision

• Preview changes in real-time

• Apply adjustments to selected images or frames

• Support both Figma and FigJam


Perfect for:

- Color correction and enhancement

- Creating color variations

- Matching brand colors

- Photo editing and retouching

- Design system maintenance
plugins.tagline: Precisely adjust image colors by HSL in selected ranges - Red, Blue, Green and more

plugins.name: KEEK.design — плагин для Figma
plugins.description:
KEEK — это второй пилот для UX/UI продуктовых дизайнеров и команд.


Мы скриншотим сервисы, аккуратно складываем их по папочкам и сценариям, чтобы вам не пришлось. Держим всё в актуальном состоянии и постоянно обновляем.


Уже собрали более 500 экранов мобильных приложений, веб и ТВ-сервисов.


Плагин дополняет функционал сайта app.keek.design. Пользователи могут искать, выбирать и вставлять нужные сценарии и скриншоты прямо в Figma, чтобы ничего не отвлекало их от решения клиентих задач.


Чтобы пользоваться плагином, необходимо авторизоваться в KEEK через Figma.

Доступно только на русском языке.
plugins.tagline: Срикншотим приложения и сервисы, чтобы вам не пришлось

Плагин дополняет функционал сайта app.keek.design. Пользователи могут искать, выбирать и вставлять нужные сценарии и скриншоты прямо в Figma, чтобы ничего не отвлекало их от решения клиентих задач.

113371.release_notes: Незаметные, но приятные обновления, чтобы подглядывать было удобнее.
113371.tagline: Срикншотим приложения и сервисы, чтобы вам не пришлось

plugins.name: ColorGen
plugins.description:
Colorgen – Your Ultimate Color Toolkit for Figma


This is my first plugin! Transform your Figma workflow with Colorgen, the all-in-one plugin designed for modern creators who want vibrant and versatile color solutions. Whether you’re looking to create harmonious palettes, stunning gradients, or nuanced color scales, Colorgen makes it easy. Plus, enjoy an engaging HSL color game to challenge and sharpen your color skills.


🌈 Key Features:


  1. Effortless Palette & Gradient Generation: Generate inspiring palettes and gradients with just a click.
  2. Interactive Color Application: Apply any generated color directly to your selected frames for seamless integration.
  3. Add to Canvas: Instantly add custom palettes and gradient scales to your Figma canvas for easy reference and use.
  4. HSL Color Game: Have fun and test your color-matching skills with a built-in color game.
  5. User-Friendly Design: Simple controls that enhance your creative process without complexity.


Elevate your design projects with Colorgen and make color exploration fun, intuitive, and impactful. Please provide feedback and any additional feature enhancements.


🛠️ Areas for Improvement:

  1. Color palette generations could be better. I'm working on incorporating color libraries and some generative features for more robust palettes.
  2. HSL Color game needs some improvement - the difficulty levels aren't as good as they could be
  3. Thinking about adding color palettes from images!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly craft vibrant color palettes & gradients & bring them straight into Figma—fun included.

121446.release_notes: Updated the color game and fixed the color picker in the gradient generator
121446.tagline: Effortlessly craft vibrant color palettes & gradients & bring them straight into Figma—fun included.

plugins.name: Peppercorn - Find Centroids (Visual Center)
plugins.description:
Find the geometric center (centroid) of vector shapes.

This experimental plugin calculates the centroid to determine the center of shapes.

👉 Usage

  1. Place your shape in a container for better experience
  2. Select the shape
  3. Run the plugin


⚠️ Note

  1. This plugin is experimental and may not work perfectly for all shapes
  2. The centroid method works best for simple and symmetrical shapes
  3. For complex or highly irregular shapes, the centroid may not always represent the visual center


🛠️ Future Updates

  1. We plan to add visual guides to help you understand the centroid's position
  2. Considering additional methods like the smallest enclosing circle for more complex shapes

accepted.name: Alexandre Broudin
accepted.description:
Product Designer.
From design to code.
linkedin.com/in/alexandrebroudin/
💸 If you like my work, buy me a croissant 🥐 or a coffee ☕️ :) paypal.me/abroudin

plugins.tagline: Precision, not guesswork: Unveil the true center of your shapes!

98464.name: Peppercorn - Find Centroids (Visual Center)
98464.description:
Find the geometric center (centroid) of vector shapes.

This experimental plugin calculates the centroid to determine the center of shapes.

👉 Usage

  1. Place your shape in a container for better experience
  2. Select the shape
  3. Run the plugin


⚠️ Note

  1. This plugin is experimental and may not work perfectly for all shapes
  2. The centroid method works best for simple and symmetrical shapes
  3. For complex or highly irregular shapes, the centroid may not always represent the visual center


🛠️ Future Updates

  1. We plan to add visual guides to help you understand the centroid's position
  2. Considering additional methods like the smallest enclosing circle for more complex shapes
98464.tagline: Precision, not guesswork: Unveil the true center of your shapes!

plugins.name: Alignify
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、FigJamで選択したノードを整列するための便利なツールです。水平方向や垂直方向への整列だけでなく、カスタム列数でのグリッド整列もサポートしています。また、ノード間の間隔を調整することも可能です。これにより、効率的で視覚的に一貫性のあるデザインを簡単に実現できます。


主な機能

  1. 水平方向整列：選択したノードを水平方向に1列で整列します。
  2. 垂直方向整列：選択したノードを垂直方向に1列で整列します。
  3. カスタムグリッド整列：選択したノードを指定した列数でグリッド状に整列します。
  4. 間隔調整：ノード間の間隔を自由に調整できます。


使い方

  1. 整列させたいノードを選択します。
  2. プラグインのインターフェースで列数や間隔を設定します。
  3. 水平方向整列、垂直方向整列、またはステッパーをクリック、もしくはドラッグします。
  4. ノードが設定に従って整列されます。


Plugin Introduction

This plugin is a handy tool for aligning selected nodes in FigJam. It supports horizontal and vertical alignment, as well as custom grid alignment with a specified number of columns. Additionally, it allows you to adjust the spacing between nodes, making it easy to achieve efficient and visually consistent designs.


Key Features

  1. Horizontal Alignment: Aligns selected nodes in a single horizontal row.
  2. Vertical Alignment: Aligns selected nodes in a single vertical column.
  3. Custom Grid Alignment: Aligns selected nodes in a grid with the specified number of columns.
  4. Spacing Adjustment: Allows you to freely adjust the spacing between nodes.


How to Use

  1. Select the nodes you want to align.
  2. Set the number of columns and the spacing in the plugin interface.
  3. Click or drag the Horizontal Alignment, Vertical Alignment, or the stepper.
  4. The nodes will be aligned according to the settings.
plugins.tagline: Multiple nodes can be easily aligned. The number of columns and spacing can also be easily set.

96727.name: Alignify
96727.description:
このプラグインは、FigJamで選択したノードを整列するための便利なツールです。水平方向や垂直方向への整列だけでなく、カスタム列数でのグリッド整列もサポートしています。また、ノード間の間隔を調整することも可能です。これにより、効率的で視覚的に一貫性のあるデザインを簡単に実現できます。

plugins.name: Ideas Spark Booth・Private Brainstorming & Retrospective Sessions
plugins.description:
Ideas Spark Booth is currently in beta. We welcome your feedback.


Ideas Spark Booth empowers your team with a powerful FigJam and Slides plugin for conducting focused brainstorming and retrospective sessions with complete participant privacy.


---


Share your ideas and submit your feedback at a single place: ideas-spark-booth.canny.io


---


Why Ideas Spark Booth


Engage with Better Brainstorming Activities

○ Set clear collaboration guidelines and establish time limits to maintain focus

○ Organize ideas into simple categories

○ Use FigJam for live brainstorming or Slides for instant team feedback


Enable Efficient Ideas Sharing

○ Track participation and engagement in real-time

○ Focus on creativity without interruptions

○ Review and refine before sharing


Present and Analyze the Insights

○ Look back at past brainstorming sessions

○ Export session data into presentation slides

○ Save your results as spreadsheets


Publish & Explore Activities

○ Store activities in the cloud

○ Share with other users

○ Browse and use community activities


---


Useful Links


Have Help

○ Read the documentation

○ Contact support


Get Involved

○ Submit feedback

○ Request a feature


Give Support

○ Follow the author


---


If you find Ideas Spark Booth useful, please share it with your colleagues!


---


○ Browser complete compatibility: Figma Desktop App, Google Chrome, Opera, Microsoft Edge, and other Chromium-based browsers

○ Partial compatibility: Mozilla Firefox, Apple Safari


---


The plugin is open-source. Feel free to both watch or fork the repository, or request a merge.


Made by Aurélien Grimaud, Senior Product Designer based in Paris.

plugins.name: Typecetera
plugins.description:
Easily create and fine-tune custom fonts directly within Figma. Main features include:

A Glyphs library to manage all your characters, live previews to test fonts on the go, and real-time Kerning adjustments for perfect spacing. No need to export or install—just design, adjust, and Use your custom fonts instantly in your projects. Ideal for both beginners and type enthusiasts looking for a smarter, more integrated approach to typography!
plugins.tagline: Create your own fonts—effortlessly, right inside Figma.

plugins.name: Palette to Variable
plugins.description:
Palette to Variable streamlines your design system color management by automatically generating professional color variations from a single base color.


Key Features:

• Generate up to 20 perfectly balanced color shades

• Preview all variations before generating

• Create color variables automatically in your chosen collection

• Get instant documentation with color values and usage

• Supports both light and dark themes


Perfect for:

• Design System Engineers

• UI/UX Designers

• Design Teams

• Brand Developers


Save hours of manual color creation while maintaining consistency across your design system. Simply choose your base color, preview the generated shades, and let the plugin handle the rest - from variable creation to documentation.


Built with Figma's native variable system for seamless integration into your workflow. No external dependencies, no complex setup - just efficient color system generation when you need it.
plugins.tagline: Generate Color Systems, Effortlessly

110984.name: Palette to Variable
110984.description:
Palette to Variable streamlines your design system color management by automatically generating professional color variations from a single base color.


Key Features:

• Generate up to 20 perfectly balanced color shades

• Preview all variations before generating

• Create color variables automatically in your chosen collection

• Get instant documentation with color values and usage

• Supports both light and dark themes


Perfect for:

• Design System Engineers

• UI/UX Designers

• Design Teams

• Brand Developers


Save hours of manual color creation while maintaining consistency across your design system. Simply choose your base color, preview the generated shades, and let the plugin handle the rest - from variable creation to documentation.


Built with Figma's native variable system for seamless integration into your workflow. No external dependencies, no complex setup - just efficient color system generation when you need it.

plugins.name: Row Column Styler
plugins.description:
Row Column Styler is your go-to plugin for streamlining design workflows when dealing with tables, grids, or any layout that involves rows and columns. Here's what you can expect from the plugin:


- 🎨 Customizable Colors: Apply your desired colors to even and odd rows or columns effortlessly.

- 📏 Automatic Alignment: Use the *tidy-up* feature to neatly align and distribute rows or columns, making your designs pixel-perfect.

- 👀 Live Preview: See how your colors and layouts will look in real-time with our interactive preview.

- 🖱️ User-Friendly Interface: Switch between row and column styling with a simple click—no complex settings required.

- ⚡ Quick Application: Apply styles instantly with the "Apply" button, saving you time on repetitive tasks.


Whether you're creating data tables or stylized layouts, Row Column Styler makes the process smoother and faster.
plugins.tagline: "Effortlessly style and preview rows or columns in Figma with custom colors and alignment."

102179.name: Row Column Styler
102179.description:
Row Column Styler is your go-to plugin for streamlining design workflows when dealing with tables, grids, or any layout that involves rows and columns. Here's what you can expect from the plugin:


- 🎨 Customizable Colors: Apply your desired colors to even and odd rows or columns effortlessly.

- 📏 Automatic Alignment: Use the *tidy-up* feature to neatly align and distribute rows or columns, making your designs pixel-perfect.

- 👀 Live Preview: See how your colors and layouts will look in real-time with our interactive preview.

- 🖱️ User-Friendly Interface: Switch between row and column styling with a simple click—no complex settings required.

- ⚡ Quick Application: Apply styles instantly with the "Apply" button, saving you time on repetitive tasks.


Whether you're creating data tables or stylized layouts, Row Column Styler makes the process smoother and faster.
102179.tagline: "Effortlessly style and preview rows or columns in Figma with custom colors and alignment."

plugins.name: Currency Formatter
plugins.description:
Effortlessly convert currencies and reformat them with a single click. From quick exchanges (e.g., 4 USD → 347.52 INR ) to precise formatting (e.g.,347 INR → ₹347), this plugin simplifies currency management and saves you time.


🚀 How does it work?


1️⃣ Select the text you want to convert or format.

2️⃣ Choose the currency for conversion or pick a format type.

3️⃣ Done! The plugin handles the rest. 🎉


It’s that simple—designed to save you time and effort.


If you have any suggestions or inquiries, feel free to reach out to me on Twitter.


If you appreciate my work, consider showing your support by buying me a coffee.
plugins.tagline: Convert. Format. Simplify – All in One Click!

plugins.name: Artboard Numbering
plugins.description:
Effortlessly organize your Figma artboards with automatic serial numbering! Select multiple artboards and watch them get numbered neatly — whether it’s 1 to 6, 01 to 15, or 001 to 163, the plugin adapts to your count.


✨ Customize your numbering:

Sequence: Left to right / top to bottom

Position: Prefix / suffix

Separator: Space, colon, pipe, underscore, hyphen, dot, or your own custom string

Custom starting number
plugins.tagline: Number your artboards effortlessly — Fully customizable!

plugins.name: EmojiAI
plugins.description:
EmojiAI is the ultimate tool for creating custom, AI-generated emojis that express you. 🎨✨ Whether you’re looking for something cute, funny, or unique, EmojiAI makes it easy to design and collect personalized emojis for any mood or moment.


🎁 Start with 10 free tokens!

New users get 10 free tokens to generate their first custom emojis. Use them to create unique designs and start building your very own emoji gallery.


💡 What EmojiAI does:

EmojiAI uses advanced AI to craft emojis tailored to your preferences. Each creation is saved to your personal emoji gallery, so you can keep, organize, and share your custom designs anytime.


⚙️ Features:

  1. AI-Generated Emojis: Let AI bring your ideas to life with custom emoji designs.
  2. Personal Emoji Gallery: Store and manage all your creations in one place.
  3. Creative Customization: Generate emojis that match your mood, personality, or style.
  4. Fun and Intuitive: Effortless for everyone, from casual users to emoji enthusiasts!


📝 How it works:

  1. Use your free tokens to generate AI-powered emojis.
  2. Save and organize your creations in your emoji gallery.
  3. Share your custom emojis with friends or simply enjoy them for yourself!


Start creating today with EmojiAI – the easiest way to design and collect personalized emojis. Your emoji gallery is waiting! 🎉
plugins.tagline: Make Your Own Emoji with the Power of AI!

plugins.name: Clean layers
plugins.description:
With Clean layers, you're able to find unnamed layers, components, and stray instances (which are component instances that no longer have a parent component), helping you maintain a clean file that's properly organized and synced.


This makes your design workflow smoother and ensures your files are easy to navigate and collaborate on.
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin that helps clean up your layers and components.

116437.name: Clean layers
116437.description:
With Clean layers, you're able to find unnamed layers, components, and stray instances (which are component instances that no longer have a parent component), helping you maintain a clean file that's properly organized and synced.


This makes your design workflow smoother and ensures your files are easy to navigate and collaborate on.
116437.release_notes: fix issue where find component could not find components nested in sections + it showed all instances
116437.tagline: A Figma plugin that helps clean up your layers and components.

plugins.name: FigmaUser
plugins.description: The FigmaUser plugin is designed for users who need to extract more data from their Figma files when using the BlocksIn App. With this plugin, you can easily get user IDs to create Figma Activity Graphs and reports. More info about BlocksIn App: https://blocksin.com/

plugins.name: Liquid Glass Effect (iOS 26)
plugins.description:
Instantly elevate your designs with the Liquid Glass effect, inspired by the latest in UI design. This powerful Figma plugin goes beyond simple glassmorphism, allowing you to create stunning, multi-layered frosted glass effects with just one click.


Stop wrestling with dozens of effect layers. Liquid Glass automates the complex process of creating depth, lighting, and a true liquid feel, so you can focus on what matters: creating beautiful, futuristic interfaces.


Key Features:

  1. One-Click Magic: Instantly apply a pixel-perfect, iOS-inspired Liquid Glass style to any frame.
  2. Deep Customization: Fine-tune every detail with simple sliders, including corner radius, background blur, opacity, and advanced shadow properties.
  3. Advanced Depth & Lighting: Automatically generates the complex inner shadows, highlights, and fills needed to create a truly three-dimensional feel.
  4. Stay Ahead of the Curve: Effortlessly bring the next generation of UI aesthetics to your projects and wow your clients.
plugins.tagline: Effortless liquid glass effects for Figma.

137072.name: Liquid Glass Effect (iOS 26)
137072.description:
Instantly elevate your designs with the Liquid Glass effect, inspired by the latest in UI design. This powerful Figma plugin goes beyond simple glassmorphism, allowing you to create stunning, multi-layered frosted glass effects with just one click.


Stop wrestling with dozens of effect layers. Liquid Glass automates the complex process of creating depth, lighting, and a true liquid feel, so you can focus on what matters: creating beautiful, futuristic interfaces.


Key Features:

  1. One-Click Magic: Instantly apply a pixel-perfect, iOS-inspired Liquid Glass style to any frame.
  2. Deep Customization: Fine-tune every detail with simple sliders, including corner radius, background blur, opacity, and advanced shadow properties.
  3. Advanced Depth & Lighting: Automatically generates the complex inner shadows, highlights, and fills needed to create a truly three-dimensional feel.
  4. Stay Ahead of the Curve: Effortlessly bring the next generation of UI aesthetics to your projects and wow your clients.
137072.tagline: Effortless liquid glass effects for Figma.

plugins.name: Transparency Fade
plugins.description:
Transparency Fade empowers designers to effortlessly apply gradient transparency to any image within Figma. Whether you're aiming for smooth fades, overlay effects, or subtle visual transitions, this plugin provides an intuitive interface to achieve professional results without the need for external tools.


Key Features:

  1. Apply linear or radial gradient transparency to images.
  2. Adjust gradient direction, opacity stops, and intensity with ease.
  3. Real-time preview to fine-tune effects seamlessly.
  4. No need for external editing software—everything is handled within Figma
plugins.tagline: Seamless Gradient Transparency for Your Images

135322.name: Transparency Fade
135322.description:

Whether you're aiming for smooth fades, overlay effects, or subtle visual transitions, this plugin provides an intuitive interface to achieve professional results without the need for external tools.

plugins.name: Iconsynx
plugins.description:
ICONSYNX plugin converts SVG icons into WebFonts (.woff2, .ttf, .eot) with seamless React, Vue, and TypeScript integration. Easily generate custom icon fonts, automate GitHub PR creation, and streamline your workflow. Perfect for teams managing CSS-based icon fonts while working with modern JavaScript frameworks.


Privacy Note:

To enable GitHub PR automation, this plugin requires access to your GitHub repository via a personal access token (GitHub token). The token is used only for creating pull requests and is stored securely. No sensitive data is collected or shared.


🔹 Key Features:

✅ Convert Figma SVGs to WebFonts (.woff2, .ttf, .eot)

✅ One-click WebFont generation for seamless icon management

✅ React & Vue support for easy integration in frontend projects

✅ TypeScript compatibility for strongly-typed icon components

✅ Automated GitHub PRs to update icon sets effortlessly

✅ Optimized font bundles to reduce file size and improve performance
plugins.tagline: Convert SVG icons into WebFonts with GitHub PR automation & React, Vue, TypeScript support.

122938.name: Iconsynx
122938.description:
ICONSYNX plugin converts SVG icons into WebFonts (.woff2, .ttf, .eot) with seamless React, Vue, and TypeScript integration. Easily generate custom icon fonts, automate GitHub PR creation, and streamline your workflow. Perfect for teams managing CSS-based icon fonts while working with modern JavaScript frameworks.


Privacy Note:

To enable GitHub PR automation, this plugin requires access to your GitHub repository via a personal access token (GitHub token). The token is used only for creating pull requests and is stored securely. No sensitive data is collected or shared.


🔹 Key Features:

✅ Convert Figma SVGs to WebFonts (.woff2, .ttf, .eot)

✅ One-click WebFont generation for seamless icon management

✅ React & Vue support for easy integration in frontend projects

✅ TypeScript compatibility for strongly-typed icon components

✅ Automated GitHub PRs to update icon sets effortlessly

✅ Optimized font bundles to reduce file size and improve performance
122938.tagline: Convert SVG icons into WebFonts with GitHub PR automation & React, Vue, TypeScript support.

plugins.name: Cham Multi-language Translator
plugins.description:
🌟 Introducing the Ultimate Figma Translation Plugin! 🌟


Say goodbye to language barriers and hello to seamless, multilingual designs! Our Figma Translation Plugin is here to revolutionize your workflow, making it easier than ever to create global-ready designs.


✨ Key Features:

🎯 Flexible Selection: Translate selected text, groups, frames, pages, or even your entire design.

✨ Quick Actions: Translate text in a snap—all with just one click!

🌍 Multilingual Output: Supports a wide range of languages to cater to global audiences.

⏱️ Bulk Edit: Save time by editing multiple text layers simultaneously.

🚀 Instant Translation: Translate text layers or entire pages in a single click—no hassle, no delays.


Whether you're working with global teams, freelancing for international clients, or designing for a multilingual audience, this plugin is your go-to solution for efficient and professional translations.


👉 Try it now and experience the difference!


Got feedback or questions? We’d love to hear from you! Reach out to us at cham@idgpt.my.id


#Figma #DesignTools #TranslationPlugin #UXDesign #DesignCommunity


Let’s make your designs speak every language! 🌍✨
plugins.tagline: Speak every language in your designs. Translate in Figma.

plugins.name: Better Node Inspector
plugins.description:
Better Node Inspector by Dualite, offers a range of capabilities for examining node properties. The interface streamlines the process of inspecting node characteristics.


Users can access general properties, positional attributes, flex and auto-layout settings, fill properties, view child elements, and explore additional properties not covered in the main categories


Open-source repo: https://github.com/dualiteindia/better-node-inspector


  1. The plugin utilizes the async Figma API
  2. Node child elements are only loaded when the user clicks on the children dropdown, significantly enhancing plugin performance and making it super fast.


Usage

Simply select a node in your project, and Better Node Inspector will display its properties in an easy-to-navigate interface.

accepted.name: Dualite
accepted.description: 🍜 Figma plugin for converting interactive prototypes to code

plugins.tagline: Better Node Inspector by Dualite is a plugin designed to help developers inspect a given Figma Node.

plugins.name: 中英文大鸟转转转
plugins.description:
大鸟转转转插件可以自动检测选定的 Figma 框架中的中文和英文文本，并分别应用相应的排版属性。用户可以设置字体、字号、字重、字间距、行高、段落间距、文本大小写和文本装饰等，确保不同语言的文本风格一致。插件非常适合需要在设计中统一管理中英文文本格式的用户，提升排版效率。


Big Bird Text Formatter plugin automatically detects Chinese and English text in selected Figma frames and applies separate typography attributes. Users can customize font, font size, font weight, letter spacing, line height, paragraph spacing, text case, and text decoration to maintain consistent styles for different languages. This plugin is perfect for users who need to manage both Chinese and English text formatting in their designs efficiently.
plugins.tagline: Streamline Chinese & English text formatting in Figma with smart optimization and style controls

114682.name: 中英文大鸟转转转
114682.description:
大鸟转转转插件可以自动检测选定的 Figma 框架中的中文和英文文本，并分别应用相应的排版属性。用户可以设置字体、字号、字重、字间距、行高、段落间距、文本大小写和文本装饰等，确保不同语言的文本风格一致。插件非常适合需要在设计中统一管理中英文文本格式的用户，提升排版效率。


Big Bird Text Formatter plugin automatically detects Chinese and English text in selected Figma frames and applies separate typography attributes. Users can customize font, font size, font weight, letter spacing, line height, paragraph spacing, text case, and text decoration to maintain consistent styles for different languages. This plugin is perfect for users who need to manage both Chinese and English text formatting in their designs efficiently.

manifest.name: 中英文大鸟转转转 Big Bird Text Formatter

114682.tagline: Streamline Chinese & English text formatting in Figma with smart optimization and style controls

plugins.name: SelectLock
plugins.description:
💪🏽 Take control of your Figma layers with SelectLock!


SelectLock is your secret weapon for maintaining design integrity in Figma. This powerful plugin lets you lock multiple layers in one go while keeping specific layer types editable.


Here's what you can do:


  1. Bulk lock layers across your entire Figma file
  2. Cherry-pick which layer types stay unlocked
  3. Use a simple checkbox interface for layer selection
  4. Lock your design with just one click
  5. Keep your layer structure intact


Perfect for designers who want to secure their work without sacrificing flexibility. Whether you're polishing a final design or collaborating with a team, SelectLock helps you stay in control. Say goodbye to the tedious task of locking layers one by one. With SelectLock, you're the boss of your design file!


👉🏼 Click here to drop a feedback

👉🏼 Send me a mail


Thank you for using SelectLock.


👉🏼 How to Use


  1. Select the frame or group containing the layers you want to lock
  2. Run the Selectlock plugin from the Plugins menu
  3. In the plugin interface, check the boxes next to any layer types you want to lock/unlock
  4. Click the "Lock/Unlock" button
  5. All checked layer types will be locked/unlocked, while unchecked layer types remain editable/uneditable.
plugins.tagline: Lock specific layer types in bulk. Keep designing freely.

101045.name: SelectLock
101045.description:

101045.tagline: Lock specific layer types in bulk. Keep designing freely.

plugins.name: QuickFrame
plugins.description:
QuickFrame is your new best friend in Figma, helping you skip the fuss and get straight to designing. Need the perfect size for a Facebook post, YouTube thumbnail, or anything in between? QuickFrame has you covered with ready-made frames that match all the popular dimensions. No more guessing or manually resizing—just pick a frame and start creating!


Why You’ll Love QuickFrame:


Ready-Made Frames: We’ve done the hard work for you with preset sizes for social media, print, mobile, and more.

Easy Tweaks: Customize dimensions, resolution, and background colors with just a few clicks—because your design should be exactly how you want it.

Super Simple: It’s quick, it’s easy, and it fits right into your Figma workflow, so you can focus on what you do best.

Saves You Time: Get your designs sized and ready in no time, so you can focus on your creativity.

QuickFrame is here to make your design process smoother and faster—so you can spend more time creating and less time fiddling with dimensions. Give it a try and see how much easier your projects can be!
plugins.tagline: QuickFrame: Your Go-To Tool for Perfectly Sized Designs

100223.description:

plugins.name: DesignSenseAI
plugins.description:
Design Sense AI – Your Smart Design Assistant


Design Sense AI is an intelligent plugin that helps designers analyze, refine, and optimize their UI/UX effortlessly. Get instant insights on visual hierarchy, typography, color contrast, accessibility, and usability—all powered by AI. No more guesswork—get clear, actionable feedback to create polished, user-friendly designs faster than ever.


🎨 Design smarter. Fix faster. Elevate your UI. 🚀
